title: A trained legal professional, in his spare time TOBY FROST enjoys writing science fiction for Black Library and other publishers. Straken is his first novel set in the grim dark future of the 41st millennium. A BLACK LIBRARY PUBLICATION Published in 2013 by Black Library

note: A CIP record for this book is available from the British Library.
